Our Projects

Delivering excellence across land, construction and marine environments

Project Highlights

Land & Construction

From residential developments to complex infrastructure, our precise surveys and layouts ensure your structures are built on solid ground.

Foundations & Reinforcement

We provide detailed engineering surveys and data analysis to support safe, efficient pouring and reinforcement for any structure.

Marine & Offshore

Our hydrographic and bathymetric expertise delivers reliable data for waterways, ports and offshore installations.

Your Vision, Our Expertise

Across Nigeria and beyond, Geo‑Mapping Consults Ltd has partnered with clients in real estate, engineering, energy and marine sectors. We combine deep local knowledge with modern equipment and rigorous project management to deliver results you can trust. Let our portfolio of successful surveys and developments inspire your next venture.

Ready to Start?

Talk to our experts about your upcoming project. We’re committed to providing insight and precision from concept to completion.
